Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. After careful consideration and assessment of its value, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $950000. This offer reflects not only the product's high quality and market value but also my desire to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. I trust that you will find this proposal attractive and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Thank you for considering our offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
